title: Gold Coast Hinterland: Five-Star Boutique Villa Escape
description: Leave it all behind and experience the tranquillity of a five-star forest retreat at the recently renovated Ruffles Lodge & Spa, just 30 minutes from the Gold Coast. Stay in a cosy villa with a fireplace and wrap-around balcony surrounded by lush forest and enjoy daily breakfast, a dinner at the lodgeâ€™s award-winning restaurant, wine tasting, spa vouchers and more.
